overview: This installment of my video project is a little different. The guys in KNOCKED OUT, JERKED OFF 4 (KOJO 4) are still straight and previously untouched-by-man, and they're still unconscious as a hand roams over their bodies and strokes their rock-solid dicks. But this time around I decided to let a friend of mine, who's been begging to get in on the action, lend a "helping hand" in some of the scenes. Hope you enjoy them as much as we did!
title: Knocked Out Jerked Off 4
